29a2('bum): sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed
29a3('bum): cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// 
29a4('bum): zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs
29a5('bum): su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cod kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du
29a6('bum): sems te bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 
29a7('bum): bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 
29a8('bum): bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang brtson
29b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol
29b2('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
29b3('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can
29b4('bum): thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la
29b5('bum): sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag
29b6('bum): gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
29b7('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can
29b8('bum): thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid
30a1('bum): la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar/ 
30a2('bum): bya'o// bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis
30a3('bum): kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba
30a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong
30a5('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa
30a6('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
30a7('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can
30a8('bum): thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med
30b1('bum): pastong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang / 
30b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar
30b3('bum): bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems
30b4('bum): can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
30b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag
30b6('bum): kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams
30b7('bum): cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i
30b8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar
31a1('bum): bya'o// bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang tshad med pa rnams/ 
31a2('bum): la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems
31a3('bum): can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par
31a4('bum): thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis
31a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas
31a6('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas
31a7('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ting nge
31a8('bum): 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang de
31b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par/ 
31b2('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag
31b3('bum): par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
31b4('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ 
31b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po/ bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
31b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
31b7('bum): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du
31b8('bum): byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa
32a1('bum): yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
32a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
32a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
32a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / 
32a5('bum): chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su/ 
32a6('bum): gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe rnam pa
32a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
32a8('bum): cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs
32b1('bum): su gtong ba'i tshe 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
32b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam
32b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs
32b4('bum): su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi
32b5('bum): dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems// dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
32b6('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
32b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
32b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
33a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa
33a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
33a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
33a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi bskyed na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
33a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
33a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
33a7('bum): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
33a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
33b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
33b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
33b3('bum): thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
33b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang
33b5('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
33b6('bum): tshe chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing dge
33b7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
33b8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
34a1('bum): phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
34a2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
34a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
34a4('bum): su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
34a5('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
34a6('bum): bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ 
34a7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
34a8('bum): tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
34b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
34b2('bum): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang
34b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams
34b4('bum): par mi byed pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
34b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
34b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi
34b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam
34b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te bzod pa des rlom
35a1('bum): sems su mi byed cing brjod pa de yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwA
35a2('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te de'i phyir
35a3('bum): go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos
35a4('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa
35a5('bum): ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
35a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
35a7('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
35a8('bum): bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni brtson
35b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos
35b2('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag
35b3('bum): la de ltar bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
35b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi
35b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus
35b6('bum): nyams par mi byed cing brtun mi nges pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
35b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams
35b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang / 
36a1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs ma yin gyi rnam pa/ 
36a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing brtson 'grus de
36a3('bum): yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus
36a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
36a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te de'iphyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
36a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
36a7('bum): yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med
36a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
36b1('bum): byiphyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
36b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
36b3('bum): byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
36b4('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
36b5('bum): bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong
36b6('bum): du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
36b7('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
36b8('bum): la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag
37a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni ngasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// me dang ldan pa shA ra rAd+ya tA
37a2('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig
37a3('bum): tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang mthun mong
37a4('bum): du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
37a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du
37a6('bum): shes nye bar gnas te bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med
37a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
37a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam/ gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes
37b1('bum): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
37b2('bum): bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
37b3('bum): dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
37b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
37b5('bum): nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su srung
37b6('bum): shing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
37b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang
37b8('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rton te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de
38a1('bum): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
38a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
38a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
38a4('bum): thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
38a5('bum): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang
38a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
38a7('bum): cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
38a8('bum): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes
38b1('bum): nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom/ 
38b2('bum): sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol
38b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
38b4('bum): sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
38b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
38b6('bum): phyin pa drug re re la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
38b7('bum): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
38b8('bum): ba rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa te/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / 
39a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dang gis kyang mi sgeg/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
39a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i
39a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par 'jog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i
39a4('bum): mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan da pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
39a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
39a6('bum): dpa' chen pos go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bar+N+Na ga/ bam pong dgu pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra / 
39a7('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhug
39a8('bum): pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di
39b1('bum): lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho
39b2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig
39b3('bum): rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
39b4('bum): dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
39b5('bum): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang chad du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su// sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
39b6('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul
39b7('bum): gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
39b8('bum): pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di
40a1('bum): lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing / 
40a2('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
40a3('bum): ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can
40a4('bum): yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ shar
40a5('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung / gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing
40a6('bum): ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin
40a7('bum): par byed byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
40a8('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang chad du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog par mdzad de/ 'jig
40b1('bum): rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
40b2('bum): par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
40b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ni byang chub sems dpa'
40b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam
40b5('bum): par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrogago/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
40b6('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
40b7('bum): bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su
40b8('bum): sgrog go// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog
41a1('bum): pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// / 
41a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang
41a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ 
41a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/  de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben
41a5('bum): sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar
41a6('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa
41a7('bum): med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes
41a8('bum): bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba
41b1('bum): med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba
41b2('bum): yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi
41b3('bum): gnyis pa/ tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs
41b4('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing dernam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcug
41b5('bum): med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
41b6('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med
41b7('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// 
41b8('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu
42a1('bum): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam kha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa
42a2('bum): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing // sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes
42a3('bum): te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes
42a4('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye sgra mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes
42a5('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag por 'das te/ 'du shes meng 'du shes med min skye
42a6('bum): mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
42a7('bum): bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams
42a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig
42b1('bum): tomi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog/ 
42b2('bum): pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par spyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba
42b3('bum): can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis
42b4('bum): myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba dal rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
42b5('bum): te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snganas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pas
42b6('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// do byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa btsugs med pa gnod
42b7('bum): pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing
42b8('bum): rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 
43a1('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i
43a2('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam
43a3('bum): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu
43a4('bum): yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa nam 'i
43a5('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
43a6('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
43a7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
43a8('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
43b1('bum): te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ 
43b2('bum): so/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs
43b3('bum): med pa na yod pa 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems
43b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod dpas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang
43b5('bum): bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes/ pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang
43b6('bum): rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par spyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
43b7('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ 
43b8('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye
44a1('bum): par bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba
44a2('bum): yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med
44a3('bum): pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
44a4('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa
44a5('bum): med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ 
44a6('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su
44a7('bum): rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi
44a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin
44b1('bum): tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du
44b2('bum): gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha'
44b3('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes
44b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dade rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do/ 
44b5('bum): zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched las nye bar bsgrubs gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
44b6('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byeng
44b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam
44b8('bum): par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson
45a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba/ 
45a2('bum): dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam
45a3('bum): par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod
45a4('bum): chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags rapa rnams kyi de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa
45a5('bum): btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'ibasam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
45a6('bum): yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang mod sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams
45a7('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbying
45a8('bum): kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis
45b1('bum): pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
45b2('bum): par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa stod pa med pa
45b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// 
45b4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad ni med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa
45b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/  mos par byas shing rnam
45b6('bum): par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas
45b7('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
45b8('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
46a1('bum): cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
46a2('bum): te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam
46a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas
46a4('bum): mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi
46a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas
46a6('bum): pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ 
46a7('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
46a8('bum): so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba
46b1('bum): la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
46b2('bum): yid bde ba dang yid mi ba dang snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pas btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang
46b3('bum): ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi
46b4('bum): dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems kyi
46b5('bum): chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas
46b6('bum): pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad
46b7('bum): med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
46b8('bum): rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa
47a1('bum): gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
47a2('bum): rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna
47a3('bum): tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha'
47a4('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha'ayas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
47a5('bum): pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do// zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
47a6('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
47a7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / 
47a8('bum): gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag dang na mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba
47b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos
47b2('bum): kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / 
47b3('bum): rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par spyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba
47b4('bum): can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bsad dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas
47b5('bum): te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba rnam par spyod pabatang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i
47b6('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med
47b7('bum): sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis
47b8('bum): pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs
48a1('bum): bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa cu/ 
48a2('bum): med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste// 
48a3('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs
48a4('bum): pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// 
48a5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa
48a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// 
48a7('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag por 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtho'
48a8('bum): yas so zhes te na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa
48b1('bum): mtha' yas so zhes te rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do/ 
48b2('bum): zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi
48b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan
48b4('bum): 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med dpa na yod pa 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul da dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i
48b5('bum): tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
48b6('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
48b7('bum): chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten
48b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa
49a1('bum): mi gnyis pa chang med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas
49a2('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa
49a3('bum): gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
49a4('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan dpa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa datshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa
49a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyidabyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'iphyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam
49a6('bum): par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar
49a7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge
49a8('bum): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su
49b1('bum): gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye
49b2('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs zhing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas
49b3('bum): yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur
49b4('bum): cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye da bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam
49b5('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
49b6('bum): pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung
49b7('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting
49b8('bum): nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan
50a1('bum): dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro
50a2('bum): dang de dag gi skyon dang 'byung ba tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
50a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gi bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ 
50a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
50a5('bum): tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang tshad
50a6('bum): med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du sems
50a7('bum): shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rtog pa dang sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
50a8('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
50b1('bum): gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
50b2('bum): po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang rnam par thar
50b3('bum): ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
50b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
50b5('bum): bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'iyan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / 
50b6('bum): byams pa dang / snying rje dang dag pa dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med
50b7('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / sbyong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i
50b8('bum): rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems med pa
51a1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
51a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du dran
51a3('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams/ 
51a4('bum): cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byad da chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
51a5('bum): cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan
51a6('bum): rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
51a7('bum): cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo
51a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa
51b1('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams
51b2('bum): bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / 
51b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom
51b4('bum): pab dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// 
51b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing bdag gis sems can thams/ 
51b6('bum): cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing sems can rnams la snying rje dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga'
51b7('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing sems can rnams
51b8('bum): kyi zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
52a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
52a2('bum): bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52a3('bum): yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod
52a4('bum): cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi da sar 'dod pa mi bskyed kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
52a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
52a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub
52a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang
52a8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing de dag
52b1('bum): gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ 
52b2('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la
52b3('bum): yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / 
52b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rang rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
52b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa
52b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
52b7('bum): gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
52b8('bum): gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs
53a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma/ 
53a2('bum): yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i
53a3('bum): tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong
53a4('bum): pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong / pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i
53a5('bum): tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa/ chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
53a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thag pa chen po ni chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par bzhog par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub
53a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi
53a8('bum): 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ bdag
53b1('bum): med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub
53b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa
53b3('bum): 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
53b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//  tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
53b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i/ chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten/ las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa
53b6('bum): med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang mang/ zag pa dang bcas pa
53b7('bum): dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'
53b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ 
54a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
54a2('bum): gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang
54a3('bum): mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
54a4('bum): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des tshul
54a5('bum): khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang / mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ 
54a6('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la
54a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod
54a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la
54b1('bum): bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa layang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
54b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang nges brtson 'grus
54b3('bum): kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
54b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
54b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la yang dag par gnas kyang nges bsam gtan yang mi
54b6('bum): dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs// byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
54b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
54b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang de la dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang // 
55a1('bum): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes
55a2('bum): rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a3('bum): dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
55a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres dpas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmig dpa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
55a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
55a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
55a7('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres/
