55a8('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
55b1('bum): bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
55b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
55b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
55b4('bum): nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
55b5('bum): pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med
55b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom
55b7('bum): mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam
55b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
56a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
56a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
56a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
56a4('bum): bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
56a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
56a6('bum): gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
56a7('bum): gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul
56a8('bum): gyis rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga bsgom mo// 
56b1('bum): rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cang mkhyed pa nyid dang / 
56b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
56b3('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
56b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i dron du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden nga pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
56b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisabasam gtan bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
56b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
56b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
56b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
57a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom mo// 
57a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
57a3('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
57a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo// rnam rapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmig
57a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
57a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
57a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
57a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
57b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i
57b2('bum): tshul gyis snying rje chen po bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs
57b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe
57b4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
57b5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i/ 
57b6('bum): phyir tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di
57b7('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
57b8('bum): zad do// rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce zhes
58a1('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming / 
58a2('bum): tsam du zad do// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sgra dmigs su med pa'i phyir sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dri dmigs
58a3('bum): su med pa'i phyir dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ro dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// reg dmigs su med pa'i phyir reg zhes bya ba 'di ni
58a4('bum): ming tsam du zad do// chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir dachos zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig/ dgi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi rnam
58a5('bum): par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rdung/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir napa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dini ming tsam du bang ngo // rtswa'i rnam
58a6('bum): par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
58a7('bum): tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi
58a8('bum): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
58b1('bum): pang rigs su med pa'i phyir na de'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming nam du zad do// 
58b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni med
58b3('bum): tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i
58b4('bum): phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg
58b5('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya
58b6('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus
58b7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs
58b8('bum): su med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'od ni ming tsam du zad do// 
59a1('bum): chu'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// me'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir me'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
59a2('bum): du zad do// rlung gi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// na mkha'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir na mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
59a3('bum): du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya ba
59a4('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes
59a5('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ming dang gzugs dmigs/ su med pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye mched drug dmigs su med pa'i
59a6('bum): phyir skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshor
59a7('bum): ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sred pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
59a8('bum): du zad do// srid pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rga shi dmigs su
59b1('bum): med pa'i phyir rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshul khrims
59b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i
59b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
59b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming de tsam du zad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
59b5('bum): su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmig/ su med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming
59b6('bum): tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir byi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya
59b7('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i
59b8('bum): phyir chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus byas
60a1('bum): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa/ 
60a2('bum): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// thog ma dang tha
60a3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa
60a4('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos thams cad
60a5('bum): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stongapa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rang / gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang
60a6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
60a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid / ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
60a8('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dran pa nye bar
60b1('bum): gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes/ 
60b2('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dbang po rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir
60b3('bum): dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med
60b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
60b5('bum): zang ngo do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i/ phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams dmigs su
60b6('bum): med pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzugs med
60b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i
60b8('bum): phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
61a1('bum): dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ 
61a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
61a3('bum): du zad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzung kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzung kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni
61a4('bum): ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mi 'jigs pa
61a5('bum): rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes/ bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// so so yang dag/ par rig pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir so so yang
61a6('bum): dag par rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// snying rje chen po dmigs su med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
61a7('bum): pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni
61a8('bum): ming tsam du zad do// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir
61b1('bum): gzhan du yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'dun ming rgyam du zang do// chos nyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya ba dzin mi cam du zad do// chos kyi dbyung sa dmigs su med pa'i phyir
61b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos skyon meng pa nyid dmigs su med pa
61b3('bum): phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmigs su med
61b4('bum): po'i phyir byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyus dmigs su med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ 
61b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'// sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// / shes rab
61b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pabam po drug bcu pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas
61b7('bum): snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang rim gro bya
61b8('bum): pa'i tshul gang dang gang 'os pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
62a1('bum): / kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la
62a2('bum): gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang / 
62a3('bum): mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu
62a4('bum): yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to// // de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ 
62a5('bum): de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
62a6('bum): namamakha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa yang
62a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad
62a8('bum): cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa thag pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
62b1('bum): pa nyid thong ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
62b2('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla/ 
62b3('bum): na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/ 
62b4('bum): zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams
62b5('bum): yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la
62b6('bum): gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs
62b7('bum): su brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams
62b8('bum): che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ 
63a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi
63a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa'
63a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas
63a4('bum): kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog/ cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs/ mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
63a5('bum): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
63a6('bum): pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
63a7('bum): bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
63a8('bum): ba rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i thag pa thag pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di
63b1('bum): zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 
63b2('bum): nuchub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ 
63b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i thag pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
63b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskord par byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
63b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhud/ sa pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
63b6('bum): chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos
63b7('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
63b8('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thag pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i
64a1('bum): mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes
64a2('bum): grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// 
64a3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so// go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das
64a4('bum): ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces/ gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
64a5('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
64a6('bum): pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi
64a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 
64a8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
64b1('bum): nyid kyi go cha bgos// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go
64b2('bum): cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha
64b3('bum): bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos rdzu 'phrul
64b4('bum): gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/  stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go/ cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden
64b5('bum): pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshadamed pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgo/ 
64b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ 
64b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying
64b8('bum): rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong
65a1('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi
65a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gangs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
65a3('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs
65a4('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang dpas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham dkyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
65a5('bum): par 'gengs so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas para'agengs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
65a6('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
65a7('bum): 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa
65a8('bum): drug tu rab tu bskyed do// nu phyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi khams gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mi snyed rnam pa drug tu
65b1('bum): rab tu bskyed do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
65b2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi
65b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// steng gi phyogs
65b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drugatu rab tu bskyed do// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung
65b5('bum): po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra
65b6('bum): brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal
65b7('bum): ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang
65b8('bum): de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
66a1('bum): thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ 
66a2('bum): de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // 
66a3('bum): dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi
66a4('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug pa sngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de
66a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems
66a6('bum): can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten do dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag
66a7('bum): nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA
66a8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
66b1('bum): la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag
66b2('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas
66b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji skad cig
66b4('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// 
66b5('bum): dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dga' ba dang bde ba des sems
66b6('bum): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
66b7('bum): shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// nges nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
66b8('bum): med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can
67a1('bum): dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang / 
67a2('bum): ngongo// de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs zhing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang
67a3('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
67a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de
67a5('bum): thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par
67a6('bum): langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
67a7('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
67a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba
67b1('bum): 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na
67b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar mye'i phyogs mtsha mos kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal
67b3('bum): ba'i ma'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhon gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjodade/ 
67b4('bum): dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems
67b5('bum): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
67b6('bum): rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig
67b7('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/

68a1('bum): ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
68a2('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams
68a3('bum): cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i
68a4('bum): sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang / bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems

68a6('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
68a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba
68a8('bum): 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas
68b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig
68b2('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe

68b4('bum): dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// 
68b5('bum): des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag na byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas/

68b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ 
68b8('bum): de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs/ 
69a1('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA

69a3('bum): dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol so

69a5('bum): skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang

69b1('bum): de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi/ 
69b2('bum): skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang phyogs
69b3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji
69b4('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin nga gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs
69b5('bum): sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jigarten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang
69b6('bum): bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
69b7('bum): gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byol
69b8('bum): song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ 
70a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas

70a4('bum): shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar lho'i phyogs dmatshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
70a5('bum): skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gzhi/ rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

70b5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

71a1('bum): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
71a2('bum): gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byol song

71a6('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi
71a7('bum): zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
71a8('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi
71b1('bum): bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byaba'i sku brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / 
71b2('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de/ 
71b3('bum): dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing
71b4('bum): 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i man bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye
71b5('bum): bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang byol so/ gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon bar sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gi sems
71b6('bum): can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba
71b7('bum): dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems
71b8('bum): can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
72a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song
72a2('bum): gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i/ 
72a3('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin
72a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par
72a5('bum): sprul nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul pa byed/ ro// de ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par/ sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// 
72a6('bum): skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do// gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do// me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa
72a7('bum): byed do// phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba sbyin par byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do// mal cha 'dod pa rnams la
72a8('bum): mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do// khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tshe ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nad kyi rkyen
72b1('bum): tsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen ci dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang mu tig dang be DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang dbul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr
72b2('bum): dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa la skom byin// 
72b3('bum): bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/ 
72b4('bum): mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin// 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la
72b5('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa la nor bu dang / mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / 
72b6('bum): man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa
72b7('bum): 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos ston pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar
72b8('bum): mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du
73a1('bum): skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa byin/ 
73a2('bum): gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug
73a3('bum): pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen
73a4('bum): rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ da nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man sheld dang / byi ru dang gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu dang mu/ 
73a5('bum): tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i
73a6('bum): mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
73a7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom
73a8('bum): byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa
73b1('bum): rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo
73b2('bum): byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul 'dod pa
73b3('bum): rnams la ni nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul byin pa nas mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// 
73b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te// rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73b5('bum): chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa shes bya'o// rab 'byoragazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen kho tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing ched du
73b6('bum): bsams te/ skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// 
73b7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
73b8('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
74a1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden
74a2('bum): pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
74a3('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod do// sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
74a4('bum): sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dadaper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
74a5('bum): mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba
74a6('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar
74a7('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
74a8('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag/ 
74b1('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
74b2('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
74b3('bum): po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
74b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes dpa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
74b5('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
74b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
74b7('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
74b8('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
75a1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can chad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod do// bsam gtan/ 
75a2('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / 
75a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtsha/ 
75a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge
75a5('bum): 'dzin thams cad gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi/ dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po
75a6('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos
75a7('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
75a8('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu dgod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
75b1('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
75b2('bum): chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgyal sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyug pas brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'dabs kyang / de la bdag gis 'jug pa'i sems 'ga'
75b3('bum): tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu dgod par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu mal
75b4('bum): mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po tshogs kyi mdun du skyes mang por chags shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol
75b5('bum): tu phyin pa la sbyar ba dang rab tu dgod pa byas na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bzod
75b6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzhag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
75b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
75b8('bum): 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 
76a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
76a2('bum): la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go dgod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad
76a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
76a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
76a5('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo/ mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon
76a6('bum): par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i khan po 'am/ skye mo'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang lus dang
76a7('bum): sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
76a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de
76b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen
76b2('bum): po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol
76b3('bum): tu byin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can
76b4('bum): thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
76b5('bum): thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
76b6('bum): la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang / 'god pa byed de de ltar yang dag par
76b7('bum): bskul ba rnams kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 
76b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i
77a1('bum): tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
77a2('bum): po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
77a3('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol
77a4('bum): tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos de nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i
77a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
77a6('bum): la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
77a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
77a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol tu
77b1('bum): mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
77b2('bum): tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi
77b3('bum): mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te gzhog cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de
77b4('bum): la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
77b5('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams
77b6('bum): cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ 
77b7('bum): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
77b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
78a1('bum): gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ 
78a2('bum): 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
78a3('bum): la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams/ 
78a4('bum): cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyig pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig
78a5('bum): rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de/ dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar
78a6('bum): bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
78a7('bum): dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams
78a8('bum): cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de
78b1('bum): thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham

84a1('bum): lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan du mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/

84a8('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol
84b1('bum): tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de
84b2('bum): bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
84b3('bum): brgya pa/ bam po re gcig pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
84b4('bum): sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gzhan/ na gyi go mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par bya'o// 
84b5('bum): 'di snyed cig ni 'god par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// / 
84b6('bum): bdag gi sems can 'di snyed cig ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni brtson 'grus kyi pha
84b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'od snyed
84b8('bum): cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can/ 
85a1('bum): 'di snyed cig ni nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par/ 
85a2('bum): bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis
85a3('bum): sems can 'di skad cig ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni chen po stong pa nyid la dgod par
85a4('bum): bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag dgis sems can 'di skad cig ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi
85a5('bum): bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di
85a6('bum): snyed cig ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dgod
85a7('bum): par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi
85a8('bum): bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dgon par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang bzhin
85b1('bum): stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni
85b2('bum): dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di
85b3('bum): snyed cig ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 
85b4('bum): 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod parabya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag
85b5('bum): gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig/ ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed
85b6('bum): cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o// 
85b7('bum): 'di da cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rngu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bani la dgod par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgyed par mi d+h+ya// dadag gas ma
85b8('bum): can 'di snyed cig ni dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni stobs lnga la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod/ 
86a1('bum): par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'di skyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//

86a7('bum): pa dgu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
86a8('bum): pal dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// 
86b1('bum): bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni gzungs kyi sgo thams
86b2('bum): cad la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod

86b4('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di de snyed cig ni snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o// 'di

87a1('bum): cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//

87a3('bum): bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod/

87a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 
87a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'dus ma
87a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dgod
87a8('bum): par bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa
87b1('bum): nyid la dgod par bya'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// dran pa nye
87b2('bum): bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o// stobs lnga la dgod
87b3('bum): par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// bsam
87b4('bum): gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o// tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod
87b5('bum): par bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa dgu la dgod par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
87b6('bum): dgod par bya'o// mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
87b7('bum): stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos

88a1('bum): bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
88a2('bum): pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor
88a3('bum): 'dug ste/ skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa

88b5('bum): du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ stong pa nyid
88b6('bum): bco brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
88b7('bum): pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ dbang po lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ stobs lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bkod par gyur pa

89a1('bum): / gyur pa yod dam/ tshad med pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rnam par thar

89a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ snying rje chen po la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod par
89a6('bum): gyur pa yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dkod
89a7('bum): par gyur pa yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rang byang chub la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam// 
89a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
89b1('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par sems bskyed/ stong pa nyid bco brgyad la dgod pa sems
89b2('bum): bskyed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ dbang po lnga
89b3('bum): la dgod par sems bskyed/ stobs lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par sems bskyed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par sems

89b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par
89b6('bum): sems bskyed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod par sems bskyed/ mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/ ting nge 'dzin
89b7('bum): thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par sems bskyed/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod
