211b8('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs
212a1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs
212a2('bum): su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chen po
212a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba
212a4('bum): dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzla dang na 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag
212a5('bum): pa nye bar bzung na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mtha' las 'das
212a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing
212a7('bum): yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dor ba med pa stong nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu
212a8('bum): rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir
212b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// 
212b2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa stong pa
212b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su
212b4('bum): med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po me dad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag
212b5('bum): banye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam
212b6('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam
212b7('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam
212b8('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin
213a1('bum): tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
213a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang
213a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
213a4('bum): bzung na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// 
213a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa stong pa/ nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam bar dag pa nye bar bzung na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig/ 
213a6('bum): lnga dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su mod do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
213a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi
213a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las/ lo'u bcu gcig pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyag/ bam po dgu pa// de nas tshe dang / 
213b1('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
213b2('bum): mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ ji ltar na na mkha' sems can grangs dang tshad ma
213b3('bum): mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
213b4('bum): po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ gnas pa yang ma mchis/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus shes
213b5('bum): bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/ gnas pa yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du
213b6('bum): theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba mi dmigs/ 'byung ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na na mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi/ 
213b7('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs so// de bzhin du thag pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
213b8('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa las/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// 
214a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
214a2('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
214a3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
214a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzung kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i
214a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las
214a6('bum): shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges
214a7('bum): nga'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
214a8('bum): dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug
214b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyog su rnam par lta ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med
214b2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang
214b3('bum): rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / hUMdabang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sbrul
214b4('bum): zhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba me du pA'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
214b5('bum): dang / sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang
214b6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i
214b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa'i ting
214b8('bum): nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa'i
215a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
215a2('bum): kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
215a3('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed
215a4('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'grod pa'i ting ngo nge/ 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med
215a5('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa'i
215a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur
215a7('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
215a8('bum): spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su spyod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
215b1('bum): nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin
215b2('bum): dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang
215b3('bum): sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon
215b4('bum): par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mtsho gra thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i
215b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel
215b6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
215b7('bum): dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams
215b8('bum): cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang
216a1('bum): dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmigs su med/ 
216a2('bum): pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas
216a3('bum): namakha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / namapa' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
216a4('bum): chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
216a5('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid/ dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas sto pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
216a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
216a7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang de/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub
216a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 
216b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag
216b2('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
216b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / 
216b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang
216b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du
216b6('bum): theg pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa ni lha dang mI dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta
216b7('bum): ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin// 
216b8('bum): pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
217a1('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par skyed/ 
217a2('bum): pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thar zug ma yan 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
217a3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa
217a4('bum): yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
217a5('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi
217a6('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor/ 
217a7('bum): gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
217a8('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs
217b1('bum): med pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
217b2('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te
217b3('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma
217b4('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi
217b5('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 
217b6('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan
217b7('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
217b8('bum): 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
218a1('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du shes de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa/ 
218a2('bum): de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa sa/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
218a3('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du shes de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi
218a4('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med// pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi// dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te
218a5('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
218a6('bum): du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
218a7('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thar zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas
218a8('bum): de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin
218b1('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen
218b2('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongasu bsgrubs
218b3('bum): pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis// 
218b4('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig de ba bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
218b5('bum): durtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
218b6('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te
218b7('bum): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba de bzhin ma nor ba de
218b8('bum): bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni// 
219a1('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par
219a2('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
219a3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ 
219a4('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
219a5('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs ba ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
219a6('bum): ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce de bzhin
219a7('bum): mnor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la thar zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni// 
219a8('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongasu bsgrubs/ 
219b1('bum): bste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 
219b2('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lus de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la
219b3('bum): ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 
219b4('bum): lus de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrun pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur/ dba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
219b5('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de
219b6('bum): bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha
219b7('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// rab 'byor yid de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag
219b8('bum): cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung
220a1('bum): pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te// byin tshu lag ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ dza
220a2('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
220a3('bum): par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med
220a4('bum): pas de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sgra de bzhin ma nor ba
220a5('bum): de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
220a6('bum): po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sgra de rnam par brtags pa rnam par
220a7('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcwa
220a8('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dri de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ 
220b1('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
220b2('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dri de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste// mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med
220b3('bum): pas/ de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ro de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan
220b4('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa/ yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni// 
220b5('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'dzag rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyurate/ rab 'byor ro de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa
220b6('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
220b7('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te reg de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ 
220b8('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
221a1('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin
221a2('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te
221a3('bum): chos de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag po ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
221a4('bum): po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnand cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos de rnam par brtags
221a5('bum): pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag/ cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha
221a6('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ 
221a7('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang
221a8('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ 
221b1('bum): mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
221b2('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
221b3('bum): cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 
221b4('bum): rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thar zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
221b5('bum): te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'ji/ rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
221b6('bum): gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug
221b7('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 
221b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir
222a1('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin
222a2('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa
222a3('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lho'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yod/ 
222a4('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
222a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma
222a6('bum): yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
222a7('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la
222a8('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
222b1('bum): te yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug ni 'gyur ba tsha
222b2('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam
222b3('bum): par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
222b4('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci
222b5('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dang/ kho zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
222b6('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi 'das te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ 
222b7('bum): mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te
222b8('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
223a1('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis man// 
223a2('bum): te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ 
223a3('bum): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor
223a4('bum): ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la thar zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
223a5('bum): po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan gyi 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa
223a6('bum): de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thar zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis
223a7('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ 
223a8('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la thar zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang
223b1('bum): rna ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa sre/ mi rtag ci
223b2('bum): mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// / 
223b3('bum): rab 'byor gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa skye/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther
223b4('bum): zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ datheg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du dbacas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
223b5('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam parabartags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos
223b6('bum): can te dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
223b7('bum): de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
223b8('bum): zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brta/ 
224a1('bum): pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
224a2('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
224a3('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang
224a4('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa
224a5('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther/ zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
224a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
224a7('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
224a8('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongasu bsgrubs pa ste/ 
224b1('bum): mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba
224b2('bum): yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin/ 
224b3('bum): du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 
224b4('bum): te/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma
224b5('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// 
224b6('bum): rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
224b7('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
224b8('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin
225a1('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// garab 'byor
225a2('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther/ 
225a3('bum): zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi
225a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po
225a5('bum): med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung / ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
225a6('bum): rkyen gyis tsher ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te / phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
225a7('bum): can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
225a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
225b1('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gnan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log
225b2('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
225b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma
225b4('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
225b5('bum): gal te chu'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yangadag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug
225b6('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chu'i
225b7('bum): khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
225b8('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te me'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin
226a1('bum): la bden pa yang dag pa rtse/ jis bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can kya dngos pa zhig yin nan/ theg pa chen pa 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
226a2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor me'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
226a3('bum): chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rlung gi khams de bzhin mnom/ 
226a4('bum): bde bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci 'og ma yin/ del bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin/ 
226a5('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcu nga'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur// rab 'byor rlung gi khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam
226a6('bum): par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
226a7('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te na mkha'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ 
226a8('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
226b1('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor na mkha'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ 
226b2('bum): de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma
226b3('bum): yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
226b4('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam dpar shes pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par
226b5('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
226b6('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ma rig pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
226b7('bum): dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
226b8('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ma rig pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thar zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
227a1('bum): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin ma
227a2('bum): nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni
227a3('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongasasu bsgrubs
227a4('bum): pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur/ ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg/ pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
227a5('bum): rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
227a6('bum): dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
227a7('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma
227a8('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
227b1('bum): te ming dang gzugs de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan lather zug mi 'gyur
227b2('bum): ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ming dang gzugs
227b3('bum): dernam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
227b4('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan/ te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te skye mched drug de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ 
227b5('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta kha bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i/ chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
227b6('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skye mched drug de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongasu bsgrubs
227b7('bum): ba ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
227b8('bum): mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
228a1('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
228a2('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te
228a3('bum): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin
228a4('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pra yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ 
228a5('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur// te/ rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par
228a6('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thor zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
228a7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sred pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste// 
228a8('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la thar zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
228b1('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sred pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te
228b2('bum): dngos po med pas de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te len pa de bzhin ma nor ba de
228b3('bum): bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ 
228b4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ darab 'byor len pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa
228b5('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bca
228b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te srid pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ 
228b7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
228b8('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor srid pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos
229a1('bum): po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te skye ba de bzhin ma nor
229a2('bum): ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni// / 
229a3('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skye ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su
229a4('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yi na 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir thug pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
229a5('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor/ gal te rga shi de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin/ kha de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
229a6('bum): dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
229a7('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rga shi de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la thar zug ma yin
229a8('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zol gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// 
229b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun cu pa/ rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ 
229b2('bum): thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin
229b3('bum): pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod
229b4('bum): pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ zag/ pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas/ pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
229b5('bum): te/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma de la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
229b6('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni// theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang
229b7('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
229b8('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa
230a1('bum): ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha
230a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
230a3('bum): gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
230a4('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos dpo ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi
230a5('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med
230a6('bum): pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med
230a7('bum): lo dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po
230a8('bum): yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nang stong pa
230b1('bum): nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te phyi stong pa nyid/ 
230b2('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyi
230b3('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te phyi nang
230b4('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// 
230b5('bum): rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
230b6('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg po chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
230b7('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
230b8('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
231a1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha/ 
231a2('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
231a3('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
231a4('bum): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas ba'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin// 
231a5('bum): te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis/ kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dus
231a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
231a7('bum): gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
231a8('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
231b1('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
231b2('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
231b3('bum): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig
231b4('bum): yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor thog
231b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma/ yin pas/ de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
231b6('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bas/ 
231b7('bum): ba'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
231b8('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen
232a1('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma
232a2('bum): yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos
232a3('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
232a4('bum): 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi// dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
232a5('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
232a6('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
232a7('bum): po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med
232a8('bum): pa ma yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po med
232b1('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
232b2('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
232b3('bum): 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// 
232b4('bum): rab 'byor gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig/ 
232b5('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin/ bas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha
232b6('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ 
232b7('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la
232b8('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar
233a1('bum): bzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis/ 
233a2('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
233a3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang // 
233a4('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ 
233a5('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'das lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcwa/ ba'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod pa
233a6('bum): zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rdzu
233a7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// 
233a8('bum): rab 'byor gal te dbang po rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
233b1('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
233b2('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te stobs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
233b3('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stobs rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
233b4('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal ta byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yi/ na te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
233b5('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur tar+ya/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ 
233b6('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lam dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
233b7('bum): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lam dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ 
233b8('bum): de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin
234a1('bum): te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ ra
234a2('bum): 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba
234a3('bum): yin no// rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
234a4('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcwa
234a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshad med pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhin/ yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
234a6('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir
234a7('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po
234a8('bum): yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 
234b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba
234b2('bum): yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
234b3('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
234b4('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal/ te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni// 
234b5('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ te/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
234b6('bum): pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
234b7('bum): te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
234b8('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ 
235a1('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams pa
235a2('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
235a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// 
235a4('bum): rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
235a5('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi
235a6('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni
235a7('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin
235a8('bum): bas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
235b1('bum): rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/

235b3('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
235b4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi
235b5('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos
235b6('bum): po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
235b7('bum): dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te snying rje
235b8('bum): chen po dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 
236a1('bum): rab 'byor snying rje chen po dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
236a2('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lham
236a3('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
236a4('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dazil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ 
236a5('bum): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi
236a6('bum): sa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
236a7('bum): te brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
236a8('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir zag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
236b1('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
236b2('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i
236b3('bum): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig
236b4('bum): yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen nga po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jidags rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
236b5('bum): 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po med la dngos po/ ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
236b6('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma
236b7('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
236b8('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni// 
237a1('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po
237a2('bum): med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi
237a3('bum): chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 
237a4('bum): rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po med la dngos dpo ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
237a5('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
237a6('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
237a7('bum): po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa
