312b8('bum): shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med
313a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes stong pa
313a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ 
313a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
313a4('bum): su mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sem/ dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig
313a5('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'dushes med pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes dben pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa la
313a6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus su mi dmigs te/ 'du shes med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben
313a7('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
313a8('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du shes med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes dben pa
313b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus grang
313b2('bum): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed
313b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i
313b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir
313b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i
313b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
313b7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
313b8('bum): / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan po shA radwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ 
314a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus su mi dmigs te/ 'du byed med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang
314a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
314a3('bum): yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin
314a4('bum): pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang // 
314a5('bum): dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa/ ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
314a6('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
314a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
314a8('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
314b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
314b2('bum): dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shA pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu mi dmigs so// rnam par
314b3('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa
314b4('bum): nyid dang / rnam par shos po dben pa dang / rnam par/ shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig/ das/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 
314b5('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes ba dben po yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo sa
314b6('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe
314b7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par
314b8('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
315a1('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir
315a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
315a3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i
315a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig med pa'i phyir byang chub
315a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
315a6('bum): dmigs so// mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig med pa dang / mig stong pa nyid dang / 
315a7('bum): mig dben pa dang / mig ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig stong pa nyid kyang
315a8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ mig dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// 
315b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mig med pa gang yin pa dang / mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig dben
315b2('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / mig ngo bo nyid medu pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
315b3('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba stong pa
315b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
315b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba / med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtharami dmigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sem
315b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
315b7('bum): mi dmigs so// rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir
315b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba
316a1('bum): med pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba med/ 
316a2('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//

316a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthor
316a7('bum): mi dmigs so// sde ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna stong

316b1('bum): dpa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// snga med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'angadabus su mi dmigs so// snga dben pa'i

320a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthar gang yin pa dang / dri ma'i mthar gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med des

320b2('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na dri med pa gang yin pa dang / dri stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dri dben pa gang yin pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/

320b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// / ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthadar mi dmigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
320b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ro ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir bya/ chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ro med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmi
320b6('bum): so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ro ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
320b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ro med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ro
320b8('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ro ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ro
321a1('bum): med pa dang / ro stong pa nyid dang / ro dben pa dang / rong bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 
321a2('bum): ro med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ro stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ro dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ro ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
321a3('bum): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ro med pa gang yin pa dang
321a4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang yin padang / ro ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
321a5('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg med pa'i phyir
321a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
321a7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// reg ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
321a8('bum): reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg ngo bo nyid med pa'i
321b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
321b2('bum): dmigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// reg ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
321b3('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg med pa dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / rag dben pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
321b4('bum): dmigs te/ reg med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg stong dpa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang/ 
321b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i// 
321b6('bum): bu de ltar na reg med pa gang yin pa dang / reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
321b7('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
321b8('bum): ti'i bu chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir
322a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chos med pa'i phyir
322a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
322a3('bum): phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so// chos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// 
322a4('bum): chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chos ngo bo nyid
322a5('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i khu chos med pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / chos dben
322a6('bum): pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chos med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
322a7('bum): ma yin/ chos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
322a8('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos med pa gang yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos
322b1('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
322b2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
322b3('bum): dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
322b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
322b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa
322b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes
322b7('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa dben
322b8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
323a1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes
323a2('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes
323a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
323a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang ga zhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
323a5('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig
323a6('bum): gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
323a7('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna
323a8('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 
323b1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
323b2('bum): so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
323b3('bum): so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
323b4('bum): dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
323b5('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes/ pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
323b6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa
323b7('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang
323b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// 
324a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
324a2('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
324a3('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
324a4('bum): su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa
324a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chubab sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i
324a6('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
324a7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
324a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
324b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i
324b2('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / sna'i rnam
324b3('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs
324b4('bum): te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i
324b5('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
324b6('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
324b7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
324b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
325a1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes
325a2('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam
325a3('bum): par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam
325a4('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo de nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma
325a5('bum): dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
325a6('bum): su mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal
325a7('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu lha'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa da na/ 
325a8('bum): pa dang / sgo'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'i mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma/ 
325b1('bum): yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
325b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
325b3('bum): bu de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
325b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
325b5('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
325b6('bum): dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
325b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byung
325b8('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben
326a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nga ba nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyim mang mi dmigs so// 
326a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
326a3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
326a4('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dalus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
326a5('bum): dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med ba la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'ami dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi rnam
326a6('bum): par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par
326a7('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
326a8('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam
326b1('bum): par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
326b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i
326b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par
326b4('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
326b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
326b6('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes
326b7('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// yid
326b8('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
327a1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid
327a2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon
327a3('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
327a4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dbenadapa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes dpa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
327a5('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
327a6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa/ 
327a7('bum): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
327a8('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams nad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
327b1('bum): sngun gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
327b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa
327b3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig
327b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/ ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te dadag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
327b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te regapa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
327b6('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa
327b7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te/ 
327b8('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ 
328a1('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te/ 
328a2('bum): reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
328a3('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi
328a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi'adus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig dgi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 
328a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ba gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu med de gnyi su
328a6('bum): byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
328a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid
328a8('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'das te reg
328b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i
328b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
328b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
328b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg
328b5('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// 
328b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te
328b7('bum): reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan yang ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
328b8('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
329a1('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo ba nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
329a2('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan
329a3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma
329a4('bum): dmigs so// sde'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
329a5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te re pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi
329a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid
329a7('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
329a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
329b1('bum): bIr byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus
329b2('bum): te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang
329b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
329b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha/ yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
329b5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ga yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa
329b6('bum): dang / smra'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
329b7('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu med de gnyisu byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i
329b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// lce'i
330a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
330a2('bum): dmigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
330a3('bum): so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigaso// lce'i 'dus te
330a4('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi da mi ga so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sam ngos dpa' dbusu mi dmigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med
330a5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lha'i
330a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma
330a7('bum): yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
330a8('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa
330b1('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
330b2('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA rangadwa
330b3('bum): ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi
330b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi ma thar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med raba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// lus
330b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 
330b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus
330b7('bum): te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
330b8('bum): sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med
331a1('bum): pa dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
331a2('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan
331a3('bum): ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// 
331a4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus
331a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
331a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi/ 
331a7('bum): mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
331a8('bum): dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
331b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi
331b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
331b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
331b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med/ pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi
331b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngonyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
331b6('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma/ 
331b7('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu de ltar
331b8('bum): na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa / 
332a1('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyangaganyi sa
332a2('bum): med de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
332a3('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mig/ 
332a4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sem/ 
332a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
332a6('bum): gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 
332a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigaso// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi
332a8('bum): migaso// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
332b1('bum): dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 
332b2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// 
332b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa
332b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher dab ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dadapa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
332b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi
332b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang
332b7('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// / 
332b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
333a1('bum): nub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// na ba'i 'dus te reg
333a2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 
333a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
333a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
333a5('bum): gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// / 
333a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
333a7('bum): dbu su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i dus te/ 
333a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i
333b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan/ 
333b2('bum): ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
333b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
333b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
333b5('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang
333b6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
333b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med
333b8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
334a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bstod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rgyu
334a2('bum): mami'i mthar mi dmigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med
334a3('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
334a4('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su mi dam gso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid ni/ dad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// de
334a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te ro/ ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
334a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus
334a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzha
334a8('bum): ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phye ma'i mtha' yang
334b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis// 
334b2('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 
334b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// 
334b4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis datshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// lha'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis
334b5('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi/ tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
334b6('bum): mi dmigaso// lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir
334b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lha'i 'dus te reg pa
334b8('bum): gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigs
335a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
335a2('bum): dpa' dbu su mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ 
335a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba
335a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dge na pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
335a5('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
335a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
335a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang
335a8('bum): yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
335b1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med
335b2('bum): de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbu' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
335b3('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi
335b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// lus/ kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub
335b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te/ 
335b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha'
335b7('bum): mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
335b8('bum): chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
336a1('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / 
336a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
336a3('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa
336a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// 
336a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
336a6('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
336a7('bum): gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
336a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang
336b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
336b2('bum): gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// 
336b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
336b4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
336b5('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i/ mthar mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
336b6('bum): mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang
336b7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
336b8('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
